import Mathlib.LinearAlgebra.Matrix.Diagonal
import Mathlib.Data.Complex.Basic
import Mathlib.LinearAlgebra.Matrix.Symmetric
import Mathlib.Data.Finset.Basic
import Mathlib.Data.Matrix.Notation
import Mathlib.Data.Matrix.Basic

import Mathlib.LinearAlgebra.Matrix.Transvection
import Mathlib.LinearAlgebra.Matrix.Block
import Mathlib.LinearAlgebra.Matrix.PosDef
import Init.Prelude
import Mathlib.Data.Finset.Basic
import Mathlib.Data.Matrix.Diagonal

open Matrix
variable {n : ℕ}
variable (hn : n > 0)

def IsCongr (A B : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℂ) : Prop :=
  ∃ (P : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℂ) (hP : IsUnit P), B = Pᵀ * A * P


theorem isCongr_refl (A : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℂ) : IsCongr A A := by sorry



theorem isCongr_symm (A B : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℂ) (h : IsCongr A B) : IsCongr B A := by sorry



theorem isCongr_trans (A B C : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℂ) (hAB : IsCongr A B) (hBC : IsCongr B C)
: IsCongr A C := by sorry



instance matrixSetoid : Setoid (Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℂ) where
  r := IsCongr
  iseqv := {
  refl := isCongr_refl
  symm := fun h ↦ isCongr_symm _ _ h
  trans := fun h₁ h₂ ↦ isCongr_trans _ _ _ h₁ h₂
}

theorem exists_congr_matrix_with_nonzero_a11 (A : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℂ)
    (hA : A.IsSymm) (h_nonzero : ∃ j, A ⟨0, hn⟩ j ≠ 0) :
    ∃ (B : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℂ) ,
      IsCongr A B ∧ B ⟨0 , hn⟩ ⟨0 , hn⟩ ≠ 0 := by sorry

import Mathlib

open scoped Matrix

theorem symm_matrix_congr_iff_rank {n : ℕ}
    (A : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℂ) (hA : A.IsSymm) :
    have hAn : A.rank ≤ n := A.rank_le_width
    let e : Fin A.rank ⊕ Fin (n - A.rank) ≃ Fin n :=
      Fintype.equivFinOfCardEq (by simp_all)
    ∃ (r : ℕ) (P : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℂ) (hP : IsUnit P),
    Pᵀ * A * P =
    (Matrix.fromBlocks
      (1 : Matrix (Fin A.rank) (Fin A.rank) ℂ)
      (0 : Matrix (Fin A.rank) (Fin (n-A.rank)) ℂ)
      (0 : Matrix (Fin (n-A.rank)) (Fin A.rank) ℂ)
      (0 : Matrix (Fin (n-A.rank)) (Fin (n-A.rank)) ℂ)
    ).reindex e e

    := by sorry
